table.caption: Seer Assignments
rows: Help the giant re-create an ancient ritual that should reveal an omen or revelation from Annam.
Steal the research notes of some ancient sage (perhaps a dragon or a yugoloth), which hold information pertinent to Annam's activities.
Explore the ruins of an ancient temple to Annam, looking for records of revelations or prophecies.
Follow a devastating storm across the countryside, carefully mapping its path and cataloging the destruction left in its wake.
Brave a dragon's hoard to steal a device that tracks the positions of invisible celestial bodies.
Search for clues pointing to the location of the {@item Adze of Annam|BGG} (described in {@book chapter 5|BGG|5|Adze of Annam}) or some other artifact related to the gods of the Ordning.
table.name: Seer Assignments
